channel.title: Weapon damage / difficulty inflicted damage
channel.description: Please let us modify the damage system like in the Black Mesa Source mod. We can't modify the enemy's health / weapon damage / the difficulty's inflicted damage values.

item.title: Weapon damage / difficulty inflicted damage
item.dc:creator: SgtKanyo
item.description:
Please let us modify the damage system like in the Black Mesa Source mod.
We can’t modify the enemy’s health / weapon damage / the difficulty’s inflicted damage values.

Read full topic
